abstract: Rumania: U S Min Gunther seeks whereabouts of A Douglas, German-Amer chemist, and wife, former German Baroness Maltzahn

headline.main: U.S. CHEMIST IS HUNTED; American Envoy in Bucharest Asks for Gigurtu's Aid
